We are delighted to welcome you to ACROP: We are delighted to welcome you to ACROPOL HOTEL and we wish you a pleasant stay!
Our main priority is to make your feel l: Our main priority is to make your feel like home! In this Directory you may find all the useful information about our facilities and services available.Enjoy your stay!
All rooms have an individual Air Conditi: All rooms have an individual Air Conditioning and Heating system. Use the remote control to set the temperature you wish. Please make sure that your balcony doors are properly closed.
The collection includes: soap, shower ge: The collection includes: soap, shower gel, shampoo, vanity kit, and shoeshine sponge. If you need extra amenities please contact Reception and inform about what you may need. Slippers available upon request.
We have baby cots available, if you need: We have baby cots available, if you need one, please contact the Reception.
Breakfast buffet is served in the restau: Breakfast buffet is served in the restaurant from 07:00 to 10:30 daily. If you wish to have breakfast earlier, please contact the Reception. We can also offer you breakfast in your room. An early breakfast package is available upon request.
A computer with a printer and a scanner: A computer with a printer and a scanner is available for your convenience in our Lobby. If you would like to send a fax, please contact our Reception team to assist you.
Check-in is at 15:00. Check-Out is by 11: Check-in is at 15:00. Check-Out is by 11:00. If you wish to extend the check-out time, please contact Reception to check availability.
We accept the following credit cards: Am: We accept the following credit cards: American Express, MasterCard, Maestro, VISA.
All our power outlets in the hotel have: All our power outlets in the hotel have an electric voltage of 230V. If you require adaptors, please contact our Reception.
If you need additional pillows or blanke: If you need additional pillows or blankets please contact our Reception team.
ACROPOL Hotel is equipped with a fire al: ACROPOL Hotel is equipped with a fire alarm system and all our staff is trained to assist you in an emergency. Smoke detectors and fire extinguishers are installed throughout the hotel.
During warmer seasons, you can enjoy you: During warmer seasons, you can enjoy your breakfast, meal or coffee in our rear garden.
All guestrooms are equipped with hair dr: All guestrooms are equipped with hair dryers stored in the closet.
There is hot water 24 hours a day.
Rooms are cleaned and tidied up daily. F: Rooms are cleaned and tidied up daily. For extra cleaning service, amenities or extra towels please contact our Reception team.
Please contact the Reception if you wish: Please contact the Reception if you wish to have delivered the iron and ironing board.
The room key cards are designed to opera: The room key cards are designed to operate all lights and air- conditioning in your room. Simply insert the key card in the wall slot upon entering the room. Please do not forget to return the key card at the Reception Desk on your departure.
We have a small book corner in our lobby: We have a small book corner in our lobby. You are welcome to borrow books anytime during your stay. Please return any borrowed book at the Reception Desk on your departure.
All found items are stored in our housek: All found items are stored in our housekeeping department for 1 month. In case you forgot something in your room, you can contact us at +30 210 68 26 650. Shipping to you is at your own cost.
There is a luggage room available to sto: There is a luggage room available to store your luggage for a few hours before check-in or after check-out.
Each guest room has its own mini-fridge.
We kindly inform our guests that our hot: We kindly inform our guests that our hotel is not set up to accommodate pets.
To avoid early morning queues at the Rec: To avoid early morning queues at the Reception you are advised to arrange your bill payment the night before, at the Reception.
Our Reception team is there for you 24 h: Our Reception team is there for you 24 hours a day. To contact Reception from your room, dial 150 or 151.
The restaurant is located on the ground: The restaurant is located on the ground floor and it is open from 12:00 to 21:30.
Our room service is available from 08:00: Our room service is available from 08:00 to 21:30. A digital menu is available directly to your smartphone simply by scanning the QR code. To order please dial 154.
Please note that we are a non - smoking: Please note that we are a non - smoking hotel. Smoking is only allowed in the room balcony and the garden.
Taxis can be called and booked at the Re: Taxis can be called and booked at the Reception at any time.
For room to room, domestic and internati: For room to room, domestic and international calls please consult the operating instructions of your room telephone device. All telephone calls will be automatically charged to your bill.
Not to miss your early start of the day,: Not to miss your early start of the day, let us wake you up in the morning. Please contact the Reception to arrange your wake - up call or consult the operating instructions of your room telephone device.
High-Speed Internet Access is available: High-Speed Internet Access is available throughout the hotel.
• Do not smoke in your room.
• Always use the ashtray provided at the: • Always use the ashtray provided at the balcony.
• Take note of the Emergency Exit Plan w: • Take note of the Emergency Exit Plan which is located at your room’s entrance
• In case of disable people please infor: • In case of disable people please inform the Reception.
What to do if you notice fire:: What to do if you notice fire:
• Raise the alarm by breaking the glass: • Raise the alarm by breaking the glass of the nearest Fire Call Point.
• Evacuate the room closing all doors be: • Evacuate the room closing all doors behind you.
• Do not stop to collect personal belong: • Do not stop to collect personal belongings.
• Alert floor room maid or any other mem: • Alert floor room maid or any other member of the staff.
• If you smell smoke stay low, smoke ris: • If you smell smoke stay low, smoke rises.
• Go to the “Assembly Point” of the hote: • Go to the “Assembly Point” of the hotel.
• Do not re-enter the building until tol: • Do not re-enter the building until told is safe to do so.
• If you are forced to stay in your room: • If you are forced to stay in your room, seal the door with wet towels, cover your mouth and nose with a damp cloth to ease breathing, open and stay near window until help arrives.
